entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text:
@realDonaldTrump @foxandfriends It's not enough your failure at managing the coronavirus killed people, now you're trying to take healthcare from millions of AMERICANS, leaving them to chose between bankruptcy or death if they get it.

So maybe shutup about Biden who actually WANTS AMERICANS to have healthcare.
